definition:
A category $\mathcal{B}_E$ is defined as an *essential subcategory* of a
(larger) category $\mathcal{A}$ if every object of $\mathcal{A}$ is
isomorphic to some object of $\mathcal{B}_E$.

[9]{} Paul Taylor. “Practical Foundations of Mathematics.”, Cambridge
University Press, 1999. (see also ).
